'''Ellen Miller''' is the wife of the man murdered by [[Brett Loveman]].

==History==
Ellen's husband, Paul, was murdered in 1994 by Brett Loveman. Over the next 17 years, she had many run-ins with [[Hillary Loveman]], who believed her husband was innocent. After Brett told Hillary he'd done it and was guilty, she refused to back down and continued to work to get a stay of execution. She went to Ellen and apologized for any hurt she'd caused to Ellen and her family and then asked Ellen to ask the governor for a stay of execution so she could have more time with Brett.

Ellen talked about all the milestones Paul had missed with their children for the last 17 years and said she didn't have any more time to give Hillary.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She was married to Paul Miller until he was murdered.

===Familial===
She has two children. Dylan played soccer and Hailey did gymnastics.
